p: All the data were reported as mean ± SD (standard deviation) and carried out with three replicates. Statistical analyses were performed with ANOVA and Tukey’s post hoc test with p < 0.05. Besides, the two-tailed Pearson’s correlation test determined later the existence of the possible relationships between parameters. All the analyses were carried out by using SPSS version 23.0 software (SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL).
